title: Chapter 1780 - The Great Profound Stage
body:
Chapter 1780 - The Great Profound Stage

The woman in the black dress really was strong.

She forced her way through the turbulent spacetime currents, cleaving a path to life through the natural order!

But she paid a grievous price. 

Her supreme, life-saving treasures had been shattered, and most of her body lay in ruin. Her injuries were severe.

Moreover, the moment she descended from the heavens, countless streaks of sword qi whooshed toward her.

Every strike was forceful and tyrannical, and they struck at an opportune moment. The woman in the black dress didn’t even get the chance to catch her breath.

Naturally, this was Su Yi’s work.

Kaboom!

Firelight ran rampant, and divine radiance rose into the air. 

The woman’s battered frame erupted with appalling black flames, and her right arm, the one holding her sheathed sword, swung through the air!

Su Yi’s countless streaks of sword qi ripped apart and broke.

Su Yi’s pupils constricted. This woman is an expert of the Great Unity Stage!

Within the spacetime portal, the purple-robed man said calmly, “Bai Liu, don’t be polite. Kill him.”

“Understood!” The woman in the black dress nodded.

The woman’s battered body was quietly knitting back together, but her face was still pale and translucent. 

There was...
